annotations.description: The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. Let's hope the players won't lose their passion and determination in the future matches. There wasn't any evident superiority by either side today. The home side attempted to create scoring opportunities mostly with long balls, while the opposition focused on counter-attacks to breach the home side's defences.
